info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:20PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Otero County through 245 PM MDT... At 219 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Cloudcroft, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cloudcroft, Alamogordo, Burro Flats, High Rolls, La Luz, Mountain Park, Karr Canyon and James Canyon. This includes Highway 54 in New Mexico near mile marker 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
